thread.title: Cristiano Ronaldo can do kick-ups with an ORANGE better than you can with a football
thread.title_full: Cristiano Ronaldo can do kick-ups with an ORANGE better than you can with a football

author: Jake Polden
title: Cristiano Ronaldo can do kick-ups with an ORANGE better than you can with a football
text:
Get Real Madrid CF updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Kick-ups with a football? 
Not for Cristiano Ronaldo , he prefers a little bit more of a challenge. You know, to perform tricks with something like an ORANGE. 
The above video shows the Real Madrid star coming down stairs for breakfast in his dressing ground and picking up the fruit from a bowl. 
He then proceeds to show off his footballing ability by performing kick-ups while walking towards the camera. 
After that he drops the orange on some weighing scales, which sets off a series of events leading to the toast popping up. How do you like your oranges in the morning? (Photo: Poker Stars) He makes it look so easy (Photo: Poker Stars) 
And guess who catches it... yes, that's right, CR7. 
The video was put together by Poker Stars, who have worked with the Portugal international in a number of recent clips. Butter? (Photo: Poker Stars) 
And also performed kick-ups in his bedroom ... while in his pants. Like us on Facebook
